## createReduxFeatureModule() function

Convenience method to create a feature module

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createReduxFeatureModule<S, FS = any, Input extends Action = AnyAction, Output extends Input = Input, Dependencies = any>(idOrModuleId?: string | ReduxFeatureModuleId<S, FS>, reducer?: Reducer<S>, epic?: Epic<Input, Output, ReduxRootState, Dependencies>, dependencies?: ArrayLike<ReduxFeatureModule<any>>): ReduxFeatureModule<S, FS>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  idOrModuleId | <code>string &#124; ReduxFeatureModuleId&lt;S, FS&gt;</code> | ID of the store, if not set, generate a random identifier |
|  reducer | <code>Reducer&lt;S&gt;</code> | optionally the reducer |
|  epic | <code>Epic&lt;Input, Output, ReduxRootState, Dependencies&gt;</code> | optionally the epic |
|  dependencies | <code>ArrayLike&lt;ReduxFeatureModule&lt;any&gt;&gt;</code> | optionally the dependencies on other modules |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ReduxFeatureModule<S, FS>`

a [ReduxFeatureModule](./redux-store.reduxfeaturemodule.md) instance
